description:
Do you need a system for creating more customers in your retail business?

Do you need proven marketing and sales strategies that are low cost and deliver consistent results?

Do you need marketing & systems training that is easy, short and fun? Training specifically designed for busy business owners...

This is the course I wish I had 7 yrs ago when I first started Shady Designs here in Sydney, Australia

The course which contains frameworks that I'll continue to use in 7 years time

If I ever sell my business, the person who buys my business will use this course to impliment all my tactics, strategies and training, continuing to grow this business and double its profits

I designed this course with a specific person in mind, my business partner and wife Lisa

We have a retail store and factory which specialises in bespoke designer lampshades handmade to order

Lisa is the creative side of the business and I manage all the sales, marketing and operations

On a recent holiday, I was watching the tv in an airport departure lounge. On the news was a frightening Air Asia plane crash

It made me think, If I died in a plane crash - Lisa doesn't have a system in place to execute all of my marketing & sales plans

Systems which I impliment in the business that help double our profits consistently every two years since we started

These short 15 minute training modules will give you focus, key strategies and templates that are vital to growing your business in a systematic way

What are the important projects that you can impliment straight away putting cash in your pocket and giving you more spare time to spend with family and loved ones

Tactics and strtategies which you can impliment over 7 days, 7 weeks or 7 months

This course is a culmination of tens of thousands of dollars in training courses, 10 years of real world hardcore retail selling... all put into one neat little short course

Discover how we took our little garage business from startup at a local flea market to what it is today employing full time staff with a sales network all over Australia

What are the low cost tools and tactics that we can use in our business that are more important than anything else

How can we make our business easy, lucrative and fun

By focusing on the one thing that I can do that will make everything else easy or not necessary at all

Join me as I take you on an inspiring journey which is Handmade Marketing by Shady Designs
title: Marketing for Retail Stores and Sellers of Handmade Products
